data.comment: The match is underway in Rotherham.
In the minute 3, Freddie Ladapo scores to make it 1-0 at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
The first half has been concluded at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
Grant Hanley (Norwich) has received a yellow card from David Webb.
In the minute 67, Florian Jozefzoon is on a sub for Mikel Miller for Rotherham.
Michael Ihiekwe blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-1.
At AESSEAL New York Stadium, Angus MacDonald is shown a red card and sent off.
In the minute 73, Rotherham make their second substitution with Richard Wood replacing Shaun MacDonald.
Michael Smith is replacing Freddie Ladapo for the home team.
The away team replace Oliver Skipp with Mario Vrancic.
In the minute 80, Daniel Farke is making the team's second substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with Teemu Pukki replacing Marco Stiepermann.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-2.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead thanks to a penalty from Jordan Hugill.
Matt Crooks (Rotherham) gets a yellow card.
The away team have replaced Emiliano Buendia with Kenny McLean. This is the third substitution made today by Daniel Farke.
